summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Proposed issue of securities (Convertible Notes)  
- **Total Securities Proposed**: 1,000,000 Converting Notes (new class)  
- **Issue Date**: 23 September 2025 (subject to shareholder approval)  
- **Key Terms**:  
  - Face value: AUD 1.00 per Note  
  - Fixed interest rate: 10% p.a., quarterly payments (first payment 7 October 2025)  
  - Maturity date: 31 July 2026  
  - Conversion: Maximum 13,808,220 ordinary shares (SPA) upon conversion (including interest)  
- **Consideration**: Debt reduction of AUD 1 million (Pure Asset Management)  
- **Approval Required**: Shareholder meeting on 18 September 2025 (ASX Listing Rule 7.1).  

**No material information omitted**; all key terms and conditions included.
